name: Curt THOMAS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Thomas v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Curt THOMAS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of December, 2007, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
937 A.2d 429
Curt THOMAS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 27, 2007.
